00098 #define GPIO_CHARSET            GPIO_PUSH_BUTTON_0
00099 
00101 #define GPIO_BACKLIGHT_MINUS    GPIO_PUSH_BUTTON_1
00102 
00104 #define GPIO_BACKLIGHT_PLUS     GPIO_PUSH_BUTTON_2
00105 
00107 unsigned short display;
00108 
00110 unsigned char TimeOut = 0;
00111 
00113 unsigned short current_char = 0;
00114 
00115 
00119 #if __GNUC__
00120 __attribute__((__interrupt__))
00121 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00122 __interrupt
00123 #endif
00124 static void compare_irq_handler(void)
00125 {
00126   TimeOut = 1;
00127   // Disable the compare and exception generation feature: set COMPARE to 0.
00128   Set_sys_compare(0);
00129 }

00135 #if __GNUC__
00136 __attribute__((__interrupt__))
00137 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00138 __interrupt
00139 #endif
00140 static void dip204_example_PB_int_handler(void)
00141 {
00142 unsigned short i;
00143 
00144   /* display all available chars */
00145   if (gpio_get_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_CHARSET))
00146   {
00147     /* go to first row of 4th line */
00148     dip204_set_cursor_position(1,4);
00149     /* display 20 chars of charmap */
00150     for (i = current_char; i < current_char + 0x10; i++)
00151     {
00152       dip204_write_data(i);
00153     }
00154     dip204_write_string("    ");
00155     /* mark position in charmap */
00156     current_char = i;
00157     /* reset marker */
00158     if (current_char >= 0xFF)
00159     {
00160       current_char = 0x10;
00161     }
00162     /* allow new interrupt : clear the IFR flag */
00163     gpio_clear_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_CHARSET);
00164   }
00165   /* increase backlight power */
00166   if (gpio_get_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_BACKLIGHT_PLUS))
00167   {
00168     dip204_set_backlight(backlight_power_increase);
00169     /* allow new interrupt : clear the IFR flag */
00170     gpio_clear_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_BACKLIGHT_PLUS);
00171   }
00172   /* decrease backlight power */
00173   if (gpio_get_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_BACKLIGHT_MINUS))
00174   {
00175     dip204_set_backlight(backlight_power_decrease);
00176     /* allow new interrupt : clear the IFR flag */
00177     gpio_clear_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_BACKLIGHT_MINUS);
00178   }
00179 }

00185 #if __GNUC__
00186 __attribute__((__interrupt__))
00187 #elif __ICCAVR32__
00188 __interrupt
00189 #endif
00190 static void dip204_example_Joy_int_handler(void)
00191 {
00192   if (gpio_get_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_JOYSTICK_UP))
00193   {
00194     dip204_set_cursor_position(19,1);
00195     dip204_write_data(0xDE);
00196     display = 1;
00197     /* allow new interrupt : clear the IFR flag */
00198     gpio_clear_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_JOYSTICK_UP);
00199   }
00200   if (gpio_get_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_JOYSTICK_DOWN))
00201   {
00202     dip204_set_cursor_position(19,3);
00203     dip204_write_data(0xE0);
00204     display = 1;
00205     /* allow new interrupt : clear the IFR flag */
00206     gpio_clear_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_JOYSTICK_DOWN);
00207   }
00208   if (gpio_get_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_JOYSTICK_LEFT))
00209   {
00210     dip204_set_cursor_position(18,2);
00211     dip204_write_data(0xE1);
00212     display = 1;
00213     /* allow new interrupt : clear the IFR flag */
00214     gpio_clear_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_JOYSTICK_LEFT);
00215   }
00216   if (gpio_get_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_JOYSTICK_RIGHT))
00217   {
00218     dip204_set_cursor_position(20,2);
00219     dip204_write_data(0xDF);
00220     display = 1;
00221     /* allow new interrupt : clear the IFR flag */
00222     gpio_clear_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_JOYSTICK_RIGHT);
00223   }
00224   if (gpio_get_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_JOYSTICK_PUSH))
00225   {
00226     dip204_set_cursor_position(19,2);
00227     dip204_write_data(0xBB);
00228     dip204_set_cursor_position(1,4);
00229     dip204_write_string("  AT32UC3A Series   ");
00230     display = 1;
00231     /* allow new interrupt : clear the IFR flag */
00232     gpio_clear_pin_interrupt_flag(GPIO_JOYSTICK_PUSH);
00233   }
00234 }

00236 
00240 void dip204_example_configure_push_buttons_IT(void)
00241 {
00242   gpio_enable_pin_interrupt(GPIO_CHARSET , GPIO_RISING_EDGE);
00243 
00244   gpio_enable_pin_interrupt(GPIO_BACKLIGHT_PLUS , GPIO_RISING_EDGE);
00245 
00246   gpio_enable_pin_interrupt(GPIO_BACKLIGHT_MINUS , GPIO_RISING_EDGE);
00247 
00248   /* Disable all interrupts */
00249   Disable_global_interrupt();
00250   /* register PB0 handler on level 1 */
00251   INTC_register_interrupt( &dip204_example_PB_int_handler, AVR32_GPIO_IRQ_0 + (GPIO_BACKLIGHT_PLUS/8), INT1);
00252   INTC_register_interrupt( &dip204_example_PB_int_handler, AVR32_GPIO_IRQ_0 + (GPIO_BACKLIGHT_MINUS/8), INT1);
00253   INTC_register_interrupt( &dip204_example_PB_int_handler, AVR32_GPIO_IRQ_0 + (GPIO_CHARSET/8), INT1);
00254   /* Enable all interrupts */
00255   Enable_global_interrupt();
00256 }
00257 
00258 
00262 void dip204_example_configure_joystick_IT(void)
00263 {
00264   gpio_enable_pin_interrupt(GPIO_JOYSTICK_UP , GPIO_FALLING_EDGE);
00265   gpio_enable_pin_interrupt(GPIO_JOYSTICK_DOWN , GPIO_FALLING_EDGE);
00266   gpio_enable_pin_interrupt(GPIO_JOYSTICK_RIGHT , GPIO_FALLING_EDGE);
00267   gpio_enable_pin_interrupt(GPIO_JOYSTICK_PUSH , GPIO_FALLING_EDGE);
00268   gpio_enable_pin_interrupt(GPIO_JOYSTICK_LEFT , GPIO_FALLING_EDGE);
00269 
00270   /* Disable all interrupts */
00271   Disable_global_interrupt();
00272   /* register PB0 handler on level 1 */
00273   INTC_register_interrupt( &dip204_example_Joy_int_handler, AVR32_GPIO_IRQ_0 + (GPIO_JOYSTICK_UP/8), INT1);
00274   INTC_register_interrupt( &dip204_example_Joy_int_handler, AVR32_GPIO_IRQ_0 + (GPIO_JOYSTICK_DOWN/8), INT1);
00275   INTC_register_interrupt( &dip204_example_Joy_int_handler, AVR32_GPIO_IRQ_0 + (GPIO_JOYSTICK_RIGHT/8), INT1);
00276   INTC_register_interrupt( &dip204_example_Joy_int_handler, AVR32_GPIO_IRQ_0 + (GPIO_JOYSTICK_LEFT/8), INT1);
00277   INTC_register_interrupt( &dip204_example_Joy_int_handler, AVR32_GPIO_IRQ_0 + (GPIO_JOYSTICK_PUSH/8), INT1);
00278   /* Enable all interrupts */
00279   Enable_global_interrupt();
00280 }
00281 
00285 void delay_ms(unsigned short time_ms)
00286 {
00287 unsigned long u32CountVal,u32CompareVal;
00288 
00289   TimeOut = 0;
00290   u32CountVal = Get_sys_count();
00291 
00292   u32CompareVal = u32CountVal  + ((unsigned long)time_ms * (FOSC0 / 1000)); // WARNING: MUST FIT IN 32bits.
00293 
00294   Set_sys_compare(u32CompareVal); // GO
00295 
00296   //  The previous COMPARE write succeeded.
00297   // Loop until the COUNT&COMPARE match triggers.
00298   while (!TimeOut);
00299 }
00300 
00301 
00305 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00306 {
00307   static const gpio_map_t DIP204_SPI_GPIO_MAP =
00308   {
00309     {DIP204_SPI_SCK_PIN,  DIP204_SPI_SCK_FUNCTION },  // SPI Clock.
00310     {DIP204_SPI_MISO_PIN, DIP204_SPI_MISO_FUNCTION},  // MISO.
00311     {DIP204_SPI_MOSI_PIN, DIP204_SPI_MOSI_FUNCTION},  // MOSI.
00312     {DIP204_SPI_NPCS_PIN, DIP204_SPI_NPCS_FUNCTION}   // Chip Select NPCS.
00313   };
00314 
00315   // Switch the CPU main clock to oscillator 0
00316   pm_switch_to_osc0(&AVR32_PM, FOSC0, OSC0_STARTUP);
00317 
00318   // Disable all interrupts.
00319   Disable_global_interrupt();
00320 
00321   // init the interrupts
00322   INTC_init_interrupts();
00323 
00324   // Register the compare interrupt handler to the interrupt controller.
00325   // compare_irq_handler is the interrupt handler to register.
00326   // AVR32_CORE_COMPARE_IRQ is the IRQ of the interrupt handler to register.
00327   // INT0 is the interrupt priority level to assign to the group of this IRQ.
00328   // void INTC_register_interrupt(__int_handler handler, unsigned int irq, unsigned int int_lev);
00329   INTC_register_interrupt(&compare_irq_handler, AVR32_CORE_COMPARE_IRQ, INT0);
00330 
00331   // Enable all interrupts.
00332   Enable_global_interrupt();
00333 
00334   // add the spi options driver structure for the LCD DIP204
00335   spi_options_t spiOptions =
00336   {
00337     .reg          = DIP204_SPI_CS,
00338     .baudrate     = 1000000,
00339     .bits         = 8,
00340     .spck_delay   = 0,
00341     .trans_delay  = 0,
00342     .stay_act     = 1,
00343     .spi_mode     = 0,
00344     .fdiv         = 0,
00345     .modfdis      = 1
00346   };
00347 
00348   // Assign I/Os to SPI
00349   gpio_enable_module(DIP204_SPI_GPIO_MAP,
00350                      sizeof(DIP204_SPI_GPIO_MAP) / sizeof(DIP204_SPI_GPIO_MAP[0]));
00351 
00352   // Initialize as master
00353   spi_initMaster(DIP204_SPI, &spiOptions);
00354 
00355   // Set selection mode: variable_ps, pcs_decode, delay
00356   spi_selectionMode(DIP204_SPI, 0, 0, 0);
00357 
00358   // Enable SPI
00359   spi_enable(DIP204_SPI);
00360 
00361   // setup chip registers
00362   spi_setupChipReg(DIP204_SPI, &spiOptions, FOSC0);
00363 
00364   // configure local push buttons
00365   dip204_example_configure_push_buttons_IT();
00366 
00367   // configure local joystick
00368   dip204_example_configure_joystick_IT();
00369 
00370   /* initialize LCD */
00371   dip204_init(backlight_PWM);
00372 
00373   /* reset marker */
00374   current_char = 0x10;
00375 
00376   // Display default message.
00377   dip204_set_cursor_position(8,1);
00378   dip204_write_string("ATMEL");
00379   dip204_set_cursor_position(7,2);
00380   dip204_write_string("EVK1100");
00381   dip204_set_cursor_position(6,3);
00382   dip204_write_string("AVR32 UC3");
00383   dip204_set_cursor_position(3,4);
00384   dip204_write_string("AT32UC3A Series");
00385   dip204_hide_cursor();
00386 
00387   /* do a loop */
00388   while (1)
00389   {
00390     if (display)
00391     {
00392       delay_ms(400);  // A delay so that it is humanly possible to see the
00393                       // character(s) before they are cleared.
00394       // Clear line 1 column 19
00395       dip204_set_cursor_position(19,1);
00396       dip204_write_string(" ");
00397       // Clear line 2 from column 18 to column 20.
00398       dip204_set_cursor_position(18,2);
00399       dip204_write_string("   "); // 3 spaces
00400       // Clear line 3 column 19
00401       dip204_set_cursor_position(19,3);
00402       dip204_write_string(" ");
00403       display = 0;
00404     }
00405   }
00406 }
